title: Login Test
description: Verify the login functionality works as expected

test_steps.expected: Login page is displayed with username and password fields
User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard

title: Logout Test
description: Verify the logout functionality works as expected

test_steps.expected: User is logged in and on the dashboard

test_steps.action: Click the logout button in the user menu
test_steps.expected: User is logged out and redirected to the login page
